title: Fock-Bargman Representation of the Distorted Heisenberg Algebra
abstract: The dynamical algebra associated to a family of Isospectral Oscillator Hamiltonians, named {\it Distorted Heisenberg Algebra} because its dependence on a distortion parameter $W \geq 0$, has been recently studied. The connection of this algebra with the Hilbert space of entire functions of growth (1/2, 2) is analized.
